messages.message: Hey! Did you mean that you run cursor locally, and the code is synced to Crafting? Or did you mean you have Cursor running as the Web IDE in crafting? I have Cursor installed on my local laptop, and wondering how to sync the code to my crafting sandbox to test

@lydia it's actually: run cursor locally + cursor connects to crafting sandbox over SSH. Files remain in the crafting sandbox (no syncing).

You have to do the `cmd+shift+p` thing first, which overrides `code`, and then use `cs vcode` to connect to the sandbox.
BTW...if you have trouble (I did the first time) make sure `cs` is fully updated. On older versions Cursor didn't work.
